title: Request Tree Trimming Near Power Line
description: A homeowner is concerned about a large tree branch growing very close to the power line that runs to their house.

tasks.description: Identify the customer's account and service location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer's address.

tasks.description: Explain the utility's vegetation management policy and the division of responsibility (utility vs. homeowner).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates that the utility is responsible for the line from the pole to the house.

tasks.description: Create a service order for the vegetation management department to inspect the tree and schedule a trimming crew.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a work order for inspection.
